about_the_game:
In a world where twerking is the only way to be respected in society, HotBunz is the story of how a new sport is giving the citizens of Buttopia an opportunity to rise above the ranks by doing something more inclusive and fun.
Play as your favorite Buttopian in a physics-based 2D Platformer Party Game navigating through varying obstacle courses to collect keys and gold coins in a series of increasingly complex levels.

- Fart your way around the level collecting coins and keys through obstacles
- Play against friends as you battle it over who can hold the key the longest
- Fart Fire (Pretty cool, we know)
- Clench your Buttopian buttcheeks onto different platforms to avoid falling off from grace
- Dress your Buttopian up to show up and show off!
- Experience Buttopian culture
- Most Importantly, HAVE FUN!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4500 (2 * 2200) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Hot Bunz is a physics-based 2D Platformer Party Game with one goal - players must battle it out over who can hold the key the longest through an array of obstacle courses in a series of increasingly complex levels to come out on top as Buttopia's Greatest Of All Time (ButtGOAT).
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Catalan
*languages with full audio support
